name: Fracas
storyline:
A peaceful temple is attacked by security forces. A military laboratory is invaded by terrorists. Everyone is looking for Hieman, a man with a mysterious illness and dangerous connections.

You will explore multiple locations, gathering information, fighting enemies and solve simple puzzles. Be sure to level up and check every loot!

Some locations change the character in your control, see their side of the story.
summary: Fracas is a dungeon crawler that evokes a retro RPG experience and a complex story. In its short duration, it seeks to keep you intrigued as you solve the mystery behind this enigmatic character that has society on the brink of collapse.
